languages.text: "Простите, {name}, но та ночь... никак не выходит из головы. Мне нужно еще немного времени, чтобы собраться с мыслями. Прошу, не торопите меня столь настойчиво".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, {name}, но та ночь... никак не выходит из головы. Мне нужно еще немного времени, чтобы собраться с мыслями. Прошу, не торопите меня столь настойчиво".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."
languages.original_text: "Простите, {name}, но та ночь... никак не выходит из головы. Мне нужно еще немного времени, чтобы собраться с мыслями. Прошу, не торопите меня столь настойчиво".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Disculpe, {name}, pero esa noche... no puedo dejar de pensar en ella. Necesito un poco más de tiempo para poner en orden mis ideas. Le ruego que no me presione».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe, {name}, pero esa noche... no puedo dejar de pensar en ella. Necesito un poco más de tiempo para poner en orden mis ideas. Le ruego que no me presione».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name} 、申し訳ありません。あの夜のことが…忘れられなくて。自分の考えをまとめるまで、もう少し時間がほしいのです。あまり急かさないでください」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: 「{name} 、申し訳ありません。あの夜のことが…忘れられなくて。自分の考えをまとめるまで、もう少し時間がほしいのです。あまり急かさないでください」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “原谅我，{name}，但那天晚上……我一直在想这件事。我还需要些时间来整理思绪，请不要这样催我。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: “原谅我，{name}，但那天晚上……我一直在想这件事。我还需要些时间来整理思绪，请不要这样催我。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, {name}, mais... je n'arrive pas à m'ôter cette nuit de la tête. J'ai besoin d'un peu plus de temps pour réfléchir. Je vous en prie, ne me brusquez pas ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, {name}, mais... je n'arrive pas à m'ôter cette nuit de la tête. J'ai besoin d'un peu plus de temps pour réfléchir. Je vous en prie, ne me brusquez pas ainsi. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, {name}, doch diese Nacht ... Ich kann nicht aufhören, daran zu denken. Ich brauche noch etwas, um meine Gedanken zu sortieren. Bitte drängt mich nicht so."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, {name}, doch diese Nacht ... Ich kann nicht aufhören, daran zu denken. Ich brauche noch etwas, um meine Gedanken zu sortieren. Bitte drängt mich nicht so."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Forgive me, , but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

languages.text: "Affına sığınıyorum {name} ama o gece, aklımdan çıkmak bilmiyor. Zihnimi toplamam için biraz daha zamana ihtiyacım var. Lütfen beni böyle acele ettirme."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, {name}, but that night... I cannot stop thinking about it. I need a little more time to gather my thoughts. Please do not rush me so."

traits.locale_text: "Af buyur {name}. O geceyi asla aklımdan çıkaramıyorum. Zihnimi toplamam için biraz daha zamana ihtiyacım var. Lütfen beni böyle aceleye getirme."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
